snippet: An Ohio judge has dismissed assault and menacing charges against former Cleveland Browns wide receiver Reggie Rucker, who police had said grabbed a man's throat and threatened to shoot him in a dispute over golf course etiquette....
lead_paragraph: An Ohio judge has dismissed assault and menacing charges against former Cleveland Browns wide receiver Reggie Rucker, who police had said grabbed a man's throat and threatened to shoot him in a dispute over golf course etiquette.

headline.main: Charges Dropped for Ex-NFL Player in Golf Course Fracas
headline.print_headline: Charges Dropped for Ex-NFL Player in Golf Course Fracas
